t: Guidelines for Student Organizations | Brand Toolkit | Towson University
s: The university brand mark must always be separate and distinct — it may not be incorporated into a student group’s logo. A student group logo must be separated from the TU mark with a thin line. The TU brand mark should always appear below or to the right of the student group logo.
